hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #Double Defense#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Fell for it, didn't you, fool? Junk hint cross split attack!

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Ice Arrows# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Goron City#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Heart Piece Room

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Water Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.
